originalText.text: I had some serious trouble with my various accounts after my wallet was stolen.  I was given superior assistance by Mr. Juan Guzzman and Mr. "Nick" Musa.  They offered excellent service and got me up and running.  Thank you so much for your competent, prompt, and empathetic service.

text.text: I had some serious trouble with my various accounts after my wallet was stolen.  I was given superior assistance by Mr. Juan Guzzman and Mr. "Nick" Musa.  They offered excellent service and got me up and running.  Thank you so much for your competent, prompt, and empathetic service.

originalText.text: THE BEST OF BEST!! It's friendly and wonderful branch. I visited Chase Bank to open a checking account as a new customer. Previously, I heard a lot of rumors that Chase Bank was unfriendly and difficult to open an account. But my prejudice is completely broken today! Hanzel helped me open my account and gave me most of the information about the account in detail. One on one for an hour. He is really professional and friendly. He gave me a perfect customer experience for Chase Bank. Thank you so much!!

originalText.text: Stuff is indifferent, unhelpful. The cashier lady was unhelpful and aggressive. Manager preferred to get my account closed by me than to convert my product. Chase lost 15k. The the do business and communicated to me as a customer was simply ridiculous. I sensed real nastiness and stuff inability to do their work. Sad. New way to do business?!

originalText.text: Wow, this was the best banking experience I’ve ever had! I needed two cashier’s checks and the incredibly kind teller (I can’t remember her name, unfortunately) double checked the information to make sure the checks were printed correctly and made sure I had proper documentation once I handed the checks over to my landlord. Looking forward to doing all of my banking at this branch in the future!
